instance.context:
`` Good '' ! replied the Senator . `` It took me five hours to write it that way '' . The misplaced modifier is another species more honored in the observance of obscurity than in the
breach . This creates an amusing effect because its position in a sentence seems to make it apply to the wrong word . A verse familiar to all grammarians is the quatrain : `` I saw a man once beat his wife When on a drunken spree .
